statements.sql: select `messages`.* from `messages` inner join (select MAX(`messages`.`id`) as `id_aggregate`, `messages`.`conversation_id` from `messages` where `messages`.`conversation_id` in (1) group by `messages`.`conversation_id`) as `latestOfMany` on `latestOfMany`.`id_aggregate` = `messages`.`id` and `latestOfMany`.`conversation_id` = `messages`.`conversation_id`

explain.query: select `messages`.* from `messages` inner join (select MAX(`messages`.`id`) as `id_aggregate`, `messages`.`conversation_id` from `messages` where `messages`.`conversation_id` in (1) group by `messages`.`conversation_id`) as `latestOfMany` on `latestOfMany`.`id_aggregate` = `messages`.`id` and `latestOfMany`.`conversation_id` = `messages`.`conversation_id`
